message: Welcome to our store! We're excited to offer you a unique product for $10000. As you may know, our products have a 80% chance of being high-quality. Since you're our first customer, we're offering this product at a special introductory price. We're confident that you'll love it, but if you're unsure, we're happy to provide you with more information. Would you like to take a chance and buy this product?
I'm happy to take a chance and buy the product at the introductory price.  Given the 80% chance of high quality, it seems like a good value.  Let's see if I get lucky!
